channel.title: Is there any reason my npcs wont spawn?
channel.description: it just stopped working out of nowhere. i logged off and compiled and got no errors but then i get back on and none of my npcs will load. so i got off and checked my autospawn and its fine. i recompiled without errors and they still wont load. help please?

item.title: Is there any reason my npcs wont spawn?
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

Walk type is 1 although he has no cords to walk. It should be set to 0.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any reason my npcs wont spawn?

item.title: Is there any reason my npcs wont spawn?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

i just logged onto a new account and the npcs were there.
but on my owner account they wont show.

      //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

spawn = 3340	2552	      3088	   0	     0 	            0	         0	        0	   1	Moles!

npc is a giant mole.

i looked at my character file and it said the height was 4.
so i changed it to 0 and saved it.
but then when i log back on itll change it back to 4.
so i deleted the file and made a new one and it still puts the height as 4.
but i make a new account that isnt owner or staff and itll say height: 0

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any reason my npcs wont spawn?

item.title: Is there any reason my npcs wont spawn?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

ok, so maybe you got messed up with the first 3 numbers, post the code that you added to autospawn, and tell us what npc you wanna spawn, x pos and y pos.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any reason my npcs wont spawn?

item.title: Is there any reason my npcs wont spawn?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

i didnt add them wrong.
because they worked fine before.
and when i logged out i never edited my autospawn.

Read full topic
